Articles.Content:
I have a secret tunneling device go under your hill, and slowly remove the material. Then I collapse your hill and build my own.

My rebuilt hill.

I build a machine gun on my hill, I say yes to Generalstarwars333's alliance but I shoot the ambassador anyways, for target practice.

My hill with a alliance, dead ambassador and machine gun.
I land an E-class asteroid on your machine gun, then plant a flag on the hill. My hill.

I "borrow" the Gespenst Mk-II S, and Gespenst Kick through the asteroid... getting stuck in the hill due to not stopping in time.

My hill due to the giant robot being stuck in it.
I annihilate cubinator in a violent war of revenge for my late ally and leave the hill in case said late ally wants to reoccupy it.

I reclaim my hill and build a anti-asteroid defence.

My asteroid-proof hill.

I make a hill on a grassy land and put a lawnmower on it.

My grassy hill with a lawnmower on it.

I burn the grass, the lawnmower explodes from the fire.

My asteroid-proof hill and burnt hill with a exploded lawnmower.

Builds up a nice little hill. Build a town on it with plenty of nice and caring folks that know each other and have annual celebrations for their own small things. It's called HillTown, and it's a nice little town.

My hill with a nice little small town with nice people.

I invite you to join the alliance, and also build a hill for the next poster, so that they won't try to take my one.

My secret underground base with a hill in it that I probably won't have for much longer.

An alliance is formed. The people are very happy. The hills become connected.

Our happy people hills.

I ask to join the alliance through my secret Hills and peacekeeper army on Eve.

 

Our interplanetary Hill alliance.

Edited December 10, 2015 by SpaceplaneAddict

I wonder how the hill is still there, then in thinking of it accidentally annihilate all hills except the original one.

My hill.

I use a Saturn V with N1s strapped to the side to put my burnt hill with a exploded lawnmower on top of my asteroid-proof hill.

 

My asteroid-proof hill with burnt grass and a exploded lawnmower and broken Saturn Vs and N1s around it.

I'm Baaaaaaaack!

I send a METEOR to destroy your asteroid resistant hill!

My crater that's asteroid proof!

I build a hill on the Mün then put a toilet on it.

 

My Mün hill with a toilet and covered in sewage due to lack of plumbing.

MURDER PLUMBER!

 

My 2 hills!

(And no more toilets!)

I use my team of highly trained giant eagles to swoop down and grab you all, taking everyone off of all the hills then waltz up to the highest one and plant my lawn chair, a small table, and an ice bucket down, then proceed to pop a dos equis and smoke a cuban.

After finally extracting it from the previous hill, the Gespenst Kick is used again. It gets stuck in it. again. You are a fine red mist underneath its right foot.

 

My hill due to having a giant robot stuck in it - could you get it out, please?

My even gianter robot performs surgery on @TARDISES's hill and extracts his robot. I build my own INDESTRUCTIBLE hill... On Duna! My INDESTRUCTIBLE hill on Duna. P.S. It's indestructible except for a big red self-destruct button hidden inside a vault... On Moho... Whose key is in another vault... On Eeloo... Whose key is in another vault... On the surface of Jool... Whose key is in yet another vault... On Dres... Whose key is in a shoebox in the most high-security area of my hill... Surrounded by 10,000 fake shoeboxes that are indistinguishable from the real thing. CAPTURE THIS, SUCKAS!!!!!

I cut Gilly in half using a modified Death Star orbiting Eve on low-beam mode, resulting in a very large hill shape. I drag it with a warp field over to Duna and land it right on top of @KAL 9000's hill. My relocated hill.
I plant a flag on your hill. My hill.

I fire 30 Kickbacks straight at your flag from far enough away that they reach peak velocity just as they hit the flag. My hill with tiny bits of SRB. Watch your step next time you try to claim my hill, they're sharp! Also, I set up a system to detect anyone/anything who attempts to climb/plant flags on the hill and fire SRBs at them if they come too close.

I build a hill in Minecraft.

My (hard to access) Minecraft hill.
I see everyone getting top smart for fighting over hills and building their own that I decide to 1up everyone by building ten thousand hills of my own. My hilly valley.
